welcomeEmail.subject: Welcome to House Pros Hub!
welcomeEmail.customerWelcomeMessage: Thank you for joining House Pros Hub! We're excited to have you as part of our community. We're here to help you find trusted contractors and service providers for all your home improvement needs.
welcomeEmail.contractorWelcomeMessage: Thank you for joining House Pros Hub! We're excited to have you as part of our community. We're here to help you connect with customers and grow your business.
welcomeEmail.bothWelcomeMessage: Thank you for joining House Pros Hub! We're excited to have you as part of our community. Whether you're looking for home improvement services or providing them, we're here to help connect you with the right people.
welcomeEmail.customerNextSteps:
As a customer, you can now:

  • Browse our directory of trusted contractors and service providers
  • Request free estimates for your home improvement projects
  • Save your favorite businesses for easy access later
  • Connect directly with professionals in your area

Get started by exploring our categories or requesting a free estimate today!
welcomeEmail.contractorNextSteps:
As a contractor, you can now:

  • Create and manage your business profile
  • Connect with potential customers in your area
  • Showcase your services and expertise
  • Build your reputation through customer interactions

Complete your business profile to start connecting with customers!
welcomeEmail.bothNextSteps:
As both a customer and contractor, you have access to:

  • Browse and connect with other professionals
  • Request estimates for your projects
  • Create and manage your business profile
  • Save favorite businesses and suppliers

Complete your business profile and start exploring our platform!

page.subtitle: Tell us about your project and we’ll connect you with pros.
page.intro: Fill out the form below and our network of trusted contractors will reach out to provide you with a free estimate.

help.tradesRequiredHint: Pick at least one to continue.

tips.customerInfo: Please provide your contact information so contractors can reach out to you.
tips.projectType: Select the type of project you're planning. This helps us match you with the right contractors.
tips.trades: Select all the trades or services you need for your project. You can select multiple options.
tips.description: Describe your project in detail. Include any specific requirements, materials, or preferences.
tips.budgetTimeline: Provide your budget range and timeline to help contractors understand your project scope.
tips.preferredContact: Choose how you'd like contractors to contact you.
tips.additionalNotes: Add any additional information that might be helpful for contractors.

terms.title: Terms of Service | House Pros Hub
terms.description: Terms of Service for House Pros Hub marketplace platform

agreementToTerms.title: 1. Agreement to Terms
agreementToTerms.content: By accessing or using House Pros Hub ("Platform", "we", "us", or "our"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service ("Terms"). If you do not agree to these Terms, you may not access or use the Platform.

platformDescription.title: 2. Platform Description
platformDescription.content: House Pros Hub is a marketplace platform that connects customers seeking home improvement and repair services with independent contractors and service providers. We provide a platform for users to discover, connect, and communicate with service providers. We do not provide the services ourselves, nor are we a party to any agreements between customers and contractors.

accountRegistration.title: 3.1 Account Registration
accountRegistration.content: To use certain features of the Platform, you must register for an account. You agree to provide accurate, current, and complete information during registration and to update such information to keep it accurate, current, and complete.

accountSecurity.title: 3.2 Account Security
accountSecurity.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account. You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.

accountEligibility.title: 3.3 Account Eligibility
accountEligibility.content: You must be at least 18 years old to create an account. By creating an account, you represent and warrant that you are at least 18 years old and have the legal capacity to enter into these Terms.

prohibitedActivities.title: 4.1 Prohibited Activities
items: Use the Platform for any illegal purpose or in violation of any laws
Post false, misleading, or fraudulent information
Impersonate any person or entity
Harass, abuse, or harm other users
Interfere with or disrupt the Platform or servers
Attempt to gain unauthorized access to any portion of the Platform
Use automated systems to access the Platform without permission
Collect or harvest information about other users without their consent

contractorResponsibilities.title: 5. Contractor Responsibilities
contractorResponsibilities.content: If you are a contractor or service provider using the Platform, you agree to:
items: Maintain all required licenses, permits, and insurance as required by law
Provide accurate information about your business, services, and qualifications
Comply with all applicable local, state, and federal laws and regulations
Perform services in a professional and workmanlike manner
Honor all commitments made to customers
Maintain appropriate insurance coverage for your business operations
Handle all tax obligations related to your business independently
contractorResponsibilities.independentContractor: Independent Contractor Status: You acknowledge that you are an independent contractor and not an employee, agent, or partner of House Pros Hub. You are solely responsible for your own taxes, insurance, and compliance with all applicable laws.

customerResponsibilities.title: 6. Customer Responsibilities
customerResponsibilities.content: If you are a customer using the Platform, you agree to:
items: Conduct your own due diligence when selecting a contractor
Verify contractor licenses, insurance, and qualifications independently
Enter into direct agreements with contractors for services
Make payments directly to contractors according to your agreement
Communicate clearly about project requirements and expectations
Treat contractors with respect and professionalism

payments.title: 7. Payments
payments.content: House Pros Hub does not process payments between customers and contractors. All payments are made directly between customers and contractors. We are not responsible for any payment disputes, refunds, or financial transactions between users. You are solely responsible for all payment arrangements and agreements with other users.

noWarranty.title: 8.1 No Warranty
noWarranty.content: THE PLATFORM IS PROVIDED "AS IS" AND "AS AVAILABLE" WITHOUT WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, OR NON-INFRINGEMENT.

noResponsibility.title: 8.2 No Responsibility for Services
noResponsibility.content: We are not responsible for the quality, safety, legality, or any other aspect of services provided by contractors. We do not endorse, guarantee, or warrant any contractor or their services. You use the Platform and engage with contractors at your own risk.

notAParty.title: 8.3 Not a Party to Agreements
notAParty.content: We are not a party to any agreements or transactions between customers and contractors. Any disputes between users must be resolved directly between the parties involved.

userGeneratedContent.title: 8.4 User-Generated Content
userGeneratedContent.content: We are not responsible for user-generated content posted on the Platform. Under Section 230 of the Communications Decency Act, we are not liable for content posted by users.

limitationOfLiability.title: 9. Limitation of Liability
limitationOfLiability.content: TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, HOUSE PROS HUB SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES, OR ANY LOSS OF PROFITS OR REVENUES, WHETHER INCURRED DIRECTLY OR INDIRECTLY, OR ANY LOSS OF DATA, USE, GOODWILL, OR OTHER INTANGIBLE LOSSES RESULTING FROM YOUR USE OF THE PLATFORM.

indemnification.title: 10. Indemnification
indemnification.content: You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless House Pros Hub, its affiliates, officers, directors, employees, and agents from any claims, damages, losses, liabilities, and expenses (including attorneys' fees) arising out of or relating to your use of the Platform, your violation of these Terms, or your violation of any rights of another party.

platformContent.title: 11.1 Platform Content
platformContent.content: All content on the Platform, including text, graphics, logos, and software, is the property of House Pros Hub or its licensors and is protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

userContent.title: 11.2 User Content
userContent.content: You retain ownership of any content you post on the Platform. By posting content, you grant us a non-exclusive, worldwide, royalty-free license to use, reproduce, modify, and display such content on the Platform.

platformDisputes.title: 12.1 Platform Disputes
platformDisputes.content: If you have a dispute with another user, you should attempt to resolve it directly with that user. We may, but are not obligated to, facilitate communication between users.

disputesWithHub.title: 12.2 Disputes with House Pros Hub
disputesWithHub.content: Any disputes arising out of or relating to these Terms or the Platform shall be resolved through binding arbitration in accordance with the rules of the American Arbitration Association, except where prohibited by law. You waive any right to a jury trial and agree to resolve disputes on an individual basis.

termination.title: 13. Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account and access to the Platform at any time, with or without cause or notice, for any reason, including if you violate these Terms. You may terminate your account at any time by contacting us.

modifications.title: 14. Modifications to Terms
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. We will notify users of material changes by posting the updated Terms on the Platform and updating the "Last Updated" date. Your continued use of the Platform after such modifications constitutes your acceptance of the updated Terms.

governingLaw.title: 15. Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the state in which House Pros Hub operates, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

contact.title: 16. Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at:

severability.title: 17. Severability
severability.content: If any provision of these Terms is found to be unenforceable or invalid, that provision shall be limited or eliminated to the minimum extent necessary, and the remaining provisions shall remain in full force and effect.

entireAgreement.title: 18. Entire Agreement
entireAgreement.content: These Terms constitute the entire agreement between you and House Pros Hub regarding the use of the Platform and supersede all prior agreements and understandings.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy | House Pros Hub
privacy.description: Privacy Policy for House Pros Hub marketplace platform

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content1: House Pros Hub ("we", "us", or "our") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our marketplace platform that connects customers with contractors and service providers.
introduction.content2: By using our Platform, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this Privacy Policy.

youProvide.title: 2.1 Information You Provide
youProvide.content: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including:
items: Account Information: Name, email address, phone number, password
Profile Information: Business name, contractor type, business description, licenses, certifications
Location Information: Street address, city, state, zip code, apartment number, gate codes, address notes
Contact Information: Phone numbers (mobile, location, business), email addresses, website URLs, social media links
Communication: Messages, reviews, feedback, and other content you post on the Platform
Payment Information: While we do not process payments, we may collect billing information if you use certain features

automaticallyCollected.title: 2.2 Automatically Collected Information
automaticallyCollected.content: When you use our Platform, we automatically collect certain information, including:
items: Device Information: IP address, browser type, operating system, device identifiers
Usage Information: Pages visited, time spent on pages, links clicked, search queries
Location Data: General location information based on IP address or device settings
Cookies and Tracking Technologies: See our Cookie Policy for more information

thirdParties.title: 2.3 Information from Third Parties
thirdParties.content: We may receive information about you from third parties, such as social media platforms if you choose to connect your account, or from service providers that help us verify information.

howWeUse.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.content: We use the information we collect to:
items: Create and manage your account
Match customers with contractors based on location, services, and preferences
Display your business profile to potential customers (for contractors)
Facilitate communication between users
Send you service-related communications, updates, and notifications
Improve and optimize the Platform
Analyze usage patterns and trends
Detect, prevent, and address fraud, security issues, and abuse
Comply with legal obligations
Respond to your inquiries and provide customer support
Send you marketing communications (with your consent, where required)

withUsers.title: 4.1 With Other Users
withUsers.content: We share certain information to facilitate connections:
withUsers.forContractors: For Contractors: Your business profile, including business name, contractor type, description, location, contact information, and links are visible to customers
withUsers.forCustomers: For Customers: Your contact information may be shared with contractors you contact or engage with

withServiceProviders.title: 4.2 With Service Providers
withServiceProviders.content: We may share your information with third-party service providers who perform services on our behalf, such as hosting, analytics, customer support, email delivery, and payment processing.

forLegalReasons.title: 4.3 For Legal Reasons
forLegalReasons.content: We may disclose your information if required by law or in response to valid legal requests, such as:
items: Compliance with court orders, subpoenas, or other legal processes
Protection of our rights, property, or safety
Protection of the rights, property, or safety of our users or others
Enforcement of our Terms of Service

businessTransfers.title: 4.4 Business Transfers
businessTransfers.content: If we are involved in a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets, your information may be transferred as part of that transaction.

withConsent.title: 4.5 With Your Consent
withConsent.content: We may share your information with third parties when you have given us your explicit consent to do so.

dataSecurity.title: 5. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. These measures include:
items: Encryption of data in transit and at rest
Secure authentication and access controls
Regular security assessments and updates
Limited access to personal information on a need-to-know basis
dataSecurity.note: However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to protect your information, we cannot guarantee absolute security.

access.title: 6.1 Access and Correction
access.content: You can access and update your account information at any time by logging into your account settings.

deletion.title: 6.2 Deletion
deletion.content: You can request deletion of your account and personal information by contacting us. We will delete your information subject to our legal obligations to retain certain data.

optOut.title: 6.3 Opt-Out of Marketing
optOut.content: You can opt-out of receiving marketing communications from us by following the unsubscribe instructions in our emails or by contacting us directly.

cookies.title: 6.4 Cookies
cookies.content: You can control cookies through your browser settings. See our Cookie Policy for more information.

doNotTrack.title: 6.5 Do Not Track
doNotTrack.content: Our Platform does not currently respond to "Do Not Track" signals from browsers. We may update this policy if a standard is established.

cookies.title: 7. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to collect and store information about your use of the Platform. Cookies are small data files stored on your device. We use cookies for:
items: Authentication and session management
Remembering your preferences
Analyzing usage patterns
Improving the Platform
cookies.cookiePolicyLink: For more detailed information about our use of cookies, please see our Cookie Policy.

childrenPrivacy.title: 8. Children's Privacy
childrenPrivacy.content: Our Platform is not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us immediately.

dataRetention.title: 9. Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to provide our services, comply with legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements. When you delete your account, we will delete or anonymize your personal information, except where we are required to retain it for legal purposes.

internationalUsers.title: 10. International Users
internationalUsers.content: Our Platform is operated in the United States. If you are accessing the Platform from outside the United States, please be aware that your information may be transferred to, stored, and processed in the United States. By using the Platform, you consent to the transfer of your information to the United States.

californiaRights.title: 11. California Privacy Rights
californiaRights.content: If you are a California resident, you have certain rights under the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA), including:
items: The right to know what personal information we collect, use, and disclose
The right to delete your personal information
The right to opt-out of the sale of personal information (we do not sell personal information)
The right to non-discrimination for exercising your privacy rights
californiaRights.contactNote: To exercise these rights, please contact us using the information provided in the Contact section.

changes.title: 12. Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the updated Privacy Policy on the Platform and updating the "Last Updated" date. Your continued use of the Platform after such changes constitutes your acceptance of the updated Privacy Policy.

contact.title: 13. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us at:

cookies.title: Cookie Policy | House Pros Hub
cookies.description: Cookie Policy for House Pros Hub marketplace platform

whatAreCookies.title: 1. What Are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and to provide information to website owners.

howWeUse.title: 2. How We Use Cookies
howWeUse.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies for the following purposes:

essential.title: 2.1 Essential Cookies
essential.content: These cookies are necessary for the Platform to function properly. They enable core functionality such as security, network management, and accessibility. You cannot opt-out of these cookies.
items: Authentication: To keep you logged in and maintain your session
Security: To protect against fraud and unauthorized access
Preferences: To remember your settings and preferences

analytics.title: 2.2 Analytics Cookies
analytics.content: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with the Platform by collecting and reporting information anonymously. This helps us improve the Platform's functionality and user experience.
items: Page views and navigation patterns
Time spent on pages
Error messages and performance issues

functionality.title: 2.3 Functionality Cookies
functionality.content: These cookies allow the Platform to remember choices you make and provide enhanced, personalized features.
items: Language preferences
Theme settings
Location preferences

session.title: 3.1 Session Cookies
session.content: These cookies are temporary and are deleted when you close your browser. They are used to maintain your session while you navigate the Platform.

persistent.title: 3.2 Persistent Cookies
persistent.content: These cookies remain on your device for a set period or until you delete them. They are used to remember your preferences and improve your experience on future visits.

thirdParty.title: 3.3 Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.content: We may use third-party services that set cookies on your device. These cookies are subject to the privacy policies of the third-party providers. We use third-party cookies for:
items: Analytics and performance monitoring
Security and fraud prevention
Content delivery networks

managing.title: 4. Managing Cookies
managing.content: You have the right to accept or reject cookies. Most web browsers automatically accept cookies, but you can modify your browser settings to decline cookies if you prefer.

browserSettings.title: 4.1 Browser Settings
browserSettings.content: You can control cookies through your browser settings. Here are links to instructions for popular browsers:

impact.title: 4.2 Impact of Disabling Cookies
impact.content: Please note that disabling cookies may affect the functionality of the Platform. Some features may not work properly if cookies are disabled.

otherTracking.title: 5. Other Tracking Technologies
otherTracking.content: In addition to cookies, we may use other tracking technologies such as:
items: Web Beacons: Small graphic images used to track user engagement
Local Storage: Data stored locally in your browser
Session Storage: Temporary data stored for the duration of your session

updates.title: 6. Updates to This Cookie Policy
updates.content: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the updated Cookie Policy on the Platform and updating the "Last Updated" date.

contact.title: 7. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about our use of cookies, please contact us at:
